          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Auszug aus einer Rede zum Kriegsbeginn 1914. Fragen zum Text und weiterführende Fragen</string>
            <string language="en">Excerpt from a speech at the beginning of the war in 1914. Questions on the text and further questions.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excerpt de um discurso no começo da guerra em

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Brano da un discorso all'inizio della guerra in

            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσπασμα από μια ομιλία στην αρχή του πολέμου σε

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Extracto de un discurso al principio de la guerra
en 1914. Preguntas sobre el texto y las preguntas posteriores.</string>
